name: Order Up
description: Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE dragon damage on a hit. If you have a Tatsugiri in your mouth, then an effect occurs depending on the form of Tatsugiri:

rows: This attack deals extra damage equal to your STR modifier.
You gain +3 AC until the start of your next turn.
You have advantage on DEX saves until the start of your next turn.

higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
